description:
Tells whether a number is even.

Example:

1. 26@0 is received via `number`
2. true@0 is sent via `even`

06d2cc9c-cda6-4ea9-9c7f-c594b767bf47.description: Number to be tested for evenness.

066af434-8df5-4f27-9f61-879431ebc09e.description: Sends true if the input value is even, false otherwise.
